pages.title: Alcohol
pages.text: By action of brewing and fermenting certain ingredients, I can gain access to some strong beverages.
pages.text2: these aren't only exquisite and euphoria inducing; they will keep me $(thing)fed$() but $(l)decrease$() my $(thing)saturation$() and also grant me with some powerful $(thing)effects$(), if not a little $(t:Continued drinking will raise the level of Tipsy, after level III nausea and blindness will appear)$(thing)tipsiness$() too...

pages.text: The gist of it is simple, it seems few others have knowledge of this process; I can either $(thing)brew$() an ingredient in a $(item)kettle$(), or I can extract its $(t:Apples and Grapes)$(thing)juice$() in a $(item)crushing tub$() or $(item)fruit press$(). Then, I let the result ferment in a barrel.
